data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Gia Lai to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gia Lai, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Gia Lai you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Gia Lai, Vietnam to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Gia Lai, Vietnam to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Akha people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Gia Lai.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Gia Lai, Vietnam so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.section_summary:
the state of Gia Lai, Vietnam has a population of 1,277,600.

We estimate Gia Lai has 27,633 people who might know Jesus, 102,479 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,147,487 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Gia Lai, Vietnam.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.
